name: dbi4php
short_description: php4dbi is a database abstraction layer for PHP.  It is simple to use (a single file with a simple API) and lean enought to not bloat your PHP application. Supports: MySQL, SQL Server, PosgreSQL, Oracle, ODBC, SQLite, DB2, Interbase
